definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
Li Fang (925-996), scholar between Tang and Song dynasties, author of fictional history

sentences.english: Then Zhou Fang started to paint based on the last draft.
sentences.chinese: 這時，周昉依照最後的草圖，揮筆作畫。

sentences.english: This event will last till Oct. 24,2010.
sentences.chinese: 我與方昉先生的作品將展出至本月24日。

sentences.english: Zhou Fang listened carefully and remembered every detail they said.
sentences.chinese: 周昉仔細聽着，一一牢記在心。

definition: (archaic) to give birth to a child/to rear
surname Chi/name of an ancient city
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
